Class ConfigReader

extends java.lang.Object
    The instance that reads the config

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConfigReader

        public ConfigReader​(java.lang.String path,
                    boolean isResourcesDir)
             throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                    java.io.IOException,
                    org.json.simple.parser.ParseException,
                    ConfigReader.ConfigKeyMissingException,
                    java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Initialise the config reader with the provided value
        Parameters:
        path - The path of the config file. If the file is in the `resources` directory, set `isResourcesDir` to true and specify the file name
        isResourcesDir - Specify if the file is in the `resources` directory
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - The file path provided does not exist
        java.io.IOException - There is an I/O error while reading the configuration
        org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - Invalid JSON
        ConfigReader.ConfigKeyMissingException - A required JSON key is missing from the configuration
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - A value defined in the JSON configuration is invalid
